guideline: Display any variables that have a negative impact on your project

criteria.title: External variables
criteria.description: Any negative external variables affecting a product or service are displayed in a publicly available resource, identifying where your product's sustainable impact can be diminished (systemic design).

guideline: Understand visitor requirements or constraints, resolving barriers to access

criteria.title: Identify and define
criteria.description: Primary and secondary target visitors are identified, and their needs are defined through quantitative or qualitative research, testing, or analytics, ensuring your visitors and affected communities remain a close part of the research and testing process.

guideline: Redundancy and duplication in code should be avoided

criteria.title: Code review
criteria.description: Regular code reviews are conducted to identify and remove redundant or duplicate code.

criteria.title: Performance optimization
criteria.description: Critical rendering path is optimized to minimize render blocking resources.

criteria.title: Green hosting
criteria.description: The hosting provider uses renewable energy and has strong environmental commitments.
